channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Psychology, Vanderbilt University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Divide-and-Conquer Predictive Coding: a structured Bayesian inference algorithm
item.description: Divide-and-conquer predictive coding (DCPC) revolutionizes structured Bayesian inference by achieving superior performance in high-dimensional problems while remaining biologically plausible.
